text: April 25 Sports Club (, Sa i o ch'eyuktan), or 4.25 SC is a multi-sports club based in Pyongyang, North Korea. They are commonly known as a football team. They also have a basketball team, an ice hockey team, and a volleyball team. ==Current squad== ==Continental history== Season Competition Round Club Home Away Aggregate 1985–86 Asian Club Championship Qualifying Tournament East Asia 1 Seiko 4–1 1–2 2nd Liaoning 3–1 0–0 2nd 1986 Asian Club Championship First Round Group 7 Liaoning 0–0 0–1 0–1 1987 Asian Club Championship Qualifying Round Group 5 August 1 0–2 0–2 3rd Hap Kuan 2–1 2–1 3rd 1988–89 Asian Club Championship Qualifying Round Group 6 South China 3–0 3–0 1st Wa Seng 4–0 4–0 1st Guangdong Wanbao 1–0 1–0 1st Yamaha Motors 3–1 3–1 1st Semi Final League Group B Mohammedan 0–1 0–1 3rd Al-Sadd 1–2 1–2 3rd Al-Ettifaq 1–1 1–1 3rd Pahang FA 2–0 2–0 3rd 1990–91 Asian Club Championship Qualifying Round Group 7 Nissan Yokohama 1–0 1–0 1st Liaoning 1–0 1–0 1st Group B Esteghlal Tehran 1–2 1–2 2nd Mohammedan 0–0 0–0 2nd Bangkok Bank 4–3 4–3 2nd Semi Final Liaoning 0–3 0–3 — Third Place Pelita Jaya 2–2 (6–7 pen.) 2–2 (6–7 pen.)
